Description.Text:
Position The Onda Hotel Club is situated in a panoramic position at 400 meters from the golden sands of the Adriatic Sea and close to the green hills of Silvi.
Restaurant Inside the Onda Hotel is the restaurant with his furnace cuisine, offers traditional regional and national levels, all with buffet service with water and wine in carafe included. Ability to prepare dishes for celiacs (from the reservation). The culinary week will be enriched by nice dinners.
More Informations The Onda Hotel Club from June 12 to September 18 offers its guests the day and evening entertainment with shows and various entertainment, canoe lessons, gymnastics and water aerobics, dance group, club 3 / 8 years. The Wave Hotel is a concession to a few meters from the beach itself, with all the amenities: beach umbrellas, deck chairs, beds, toilets, changing rooms, showers.
